name: Lupinball
description: Werewolves shooting fireballs at each other! Survive each round as it becomes more and more chaotic from everyone's fireballs bouncing around non-stop. Be the last wolf standing in this hilarious 2-4 player arcade deathmatch, local or online!
minimum_requirements: OS: I've heard it runs on XP SP2 but you should be on something newer by now Processor: Something that runs quickly Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Something that displays pictures quickly DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: You'd better have one, Fox Amoore worked really hard on the soundtrack
recommended_requirements: OS: Do you even read these I mean come on Processor: Lupinball doesn't need the latest hardware DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection
